item.title: Practical Genomics Workshop 2018
item.description: These exercises were used as preparation for participants in the 2018 Practical Genomics workshop. More information and registration for future workshops can be found at JHU Genomics. Prerequisites Install R (version 3.4.3 or higher) and RStudio (version 1.1.423 or higher). Some familiarity with basic R commands. Prior to completing these assignments, participants were asked to complete the Swirl “R Programming: The basics of programming in R” exercises. Note: Participants were primarily graduate students and postdoctoral fellows studying biology, so some biological concepts are not explained.
